description: Simple layout for photo galleries, portfolios, and more.
name: mecha-cms/y.bootstrap.album

suggest.mecha-cms/x.panel: The edit button is not available without this extension.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.panel.image: Install this extension if you want to have a proper featured image field in the control panel.
suggest.mecha-cms/x.user: The edit button is not available without this extension.
